response.overview: Compilation video released in 2008, but of all archival footage from the 1990's.  Watch the stars doing each other! Non-stop star studded action! A unique collection never assembled before! Every scene a hit, every scene a classic! The legendary Nina Hartley was privileged to fuck all these well known porn kings and these porn kings were definitely blessed to fuck the original Queen of Porn. Just think back to when you were a teenager and you turn on the television to find a freaky movie in the VCR ... a mistake made by your parents, but you notice that your first crush was on the blonde bombshell. Well fellas this is your lucky day we have a Gold Collection Special Edition compilation of Nina Hartley, Nina Hartley, and more Nina Hartley all for your eyes only!
response.title: Nina Hartley Screws the Stars
